items.item_details: The Special Board Meeting will begin at 5:30 p.m. in the Board Room of the Education Center.   Anyone wishing to address the Board regarding Open Session items may speak at this time.

I pledge allegiance 
to the flag of the
United States of America
and to the Republic
for which it stands
one nation under God
indivisible with liberty
and justice for all.
Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.

items.item_details: For consideration by the Board of Trustees.
items.item_text: 4.01 For consideration by the Board of Trustees
items.item_text_raw: 4.01 For consideration by the Board of Trustees

items.item_details: Any person may address the Board on any item on the meeting agenda. Persons wishing to address the Board must fill out a speaker request form, which is located at the entrance of the Board Room. When your name is called, please come to the podium, state your name for the record, and limit your remarks to three (3) minutes.

meeting_sections.section_name: PUBLIC MEMBERS WHO WISH TO ADDRESS THE BOARD

items.item_details:
EAST SIDE UNION HIGH SCHOOL DISTRICT
	 
	 
	 
TO:
Board of Trustees
				 
				 
FROM: 
Chris D. Funk, Superintendent
				 
				 
PREPARED BY:
Marcus Battle, Associate Superintendent of Business Services, and J. Manuel Herrera, 
Board Clerk
				 
				 
SUBJECT:
Presentation, Discussion and/or Action Regarding Budget Development Process and Proposed Process for Vetting the District Budget
	 
	 
The Board will have a discussion regarding the budget development process and proposed process for vetting the District Budget.
	 
	 
	 
	 
RECOMMENDATION:
As stipulated by the Board of Trustees.

Persons wishing to address the Board on Closed Session items must fill out a speaker request form, which is located at the entrance of the Board Room.
